<a id="PhysicsServer3DManager"></a>

# PhysicsServer3DManager

**Inherits:** [Object](Object.md)

A singleton for managing [PhysicsServer3D](PhysicsServer3D.md) implementations.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**PhysicsServer3DManager** is the API for registering [PhysicsServer3D](PhysicsServer3D.md) implementations and for setting the default implementation.

\ **Note:** It is not possible to switch physics servers at runtime. This class is only used on startup at the server initialization level, by Redot itself and possibly by GDExtensions.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="PhysicsServer3DManager_method_register_server"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **register_server**\ (\ name\: [String](String.md), create_callback\: [Callable](Callable.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#PhysicsServer3DManager_method_register_server)

Register a [PhysicsServer3D](PhysicsServer3D.md) implementation by passing a `name` and a [Callable](Callable.md) that returns a [PhysicsServer3D](PhysicsServer3D.md) object.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicsServer3DManager_method_set_default_server"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_default_server**\ (\ name\: [String](String.md), priority\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#PhysicsServer3DManager_method_set_default_server)

Set the default [PhysicsServer3D](PhysicsServer3D.md) implementation to the one identified by `name`, if `priority` is greater than the priority of the current default implementation.
